'''v0.7.5 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' released on September 4, 2013 for Android and on September 12, 2013 for iOS. It fixes some of the bugs and crashes in [[Pocket Edition v0.7.4 alpha|v0.7.4]].

== Additions ==
* Crafting can now be closed with the menu button on the Xperia Play.
